resources.string:
Hi! 

My name is Alexander. 

I respect the deadlines and attentive to the details of technical tasks. 
I always consider user experience and look for optimal solutions to problems. 

2016 – Present 

I have been studying Java development since August 2016 on offline courses in Kiev and online on JavaRush, 
GeekBrains, Udacity, etc., on articles and books, making learning projects. 
Since 2017, I have been studying Java development for Android (with XML, SQLite, JSON). 
I developed and made some android applications. 

2003 – 2018 

I have over 10 years of positive experience in the media and public communications. 
At various times I held the position of PR-manager, editor, journalist. 
My responsibilities included data analysis, creating and working with different texts, 
project management, etc.
